title.rendered: E-commerce System: Work on your (E-commerce) Business Not in it with Marvin Harris of Ovalz

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 33:37 — 30.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 33:37 — 30.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Marvin is a consultant/CEO of Ovalz, a free online inventory checking software.

He has more than 25+ years of experience building efficiencies, creating technology products, and implementing software. He is a solution-driven individual with a passion for creating new and better ways of doing things.

In this podcast, Marvin will share his thoughts on Working on your E-commerce Business rather than in it.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • How to work ON your business not IN it
  • Knowing how to connect to your customer avatar
  • How to build & market the offer
  • Managing and optimising – staying in tune with customers
  • Knowing the business behind the business processes
